chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
Hq: 0 < q
r: nat
Hr: r = power q 2
Hr': 2 <= r
n: nat
e: nat -> nat
f: nat -> nat
m: nat

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ sum_powers r n f e -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = sum_powers r k g (fun i : nat => e (h i)) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation sum_powers := (fun r n f e => ∑ n (fun i => f i * power (e i) r))
binary_le_joins_inv : forall (m n : nat) f, m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 k g /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
binary_le_sum_powers : forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ g i)
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
meet_sum_powers : forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ⇣ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i * power (e i) r)
nat_double_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> nat) g, (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> exists k : nat, k < m /\ f i j ≲ g k) -> msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (f i)) ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
sum_power_binary_lt : forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) f, k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k) < power n k
nat_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) f g, (forall i : nat, i < n -> exists j : nat, j < m /\ f i ≲ g j) -> msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
sinc_injective : forall (n : nat) f, (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
binary_le_joins_inv' : forall (m n : nat) f, m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {g : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 n g /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
sum_powers_euclid : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall j : nat, j < n -> e 1 <= e (S j)) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = f 0 * power (e 0) r + ∑ n (fun i : nat => f (S i) * power (e (S i) - e 1) r) * power (e 1) r
nat_ortho_joins : forall (m n : nat) f g, msum nat_join 0 m f ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n g = 0 < -> (forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < n -> f i ⇣ g j = 0)
nat_ortho_sum_join : forall (n : nat) f, (forall i j : nat, i <> j -> i < n -> j < n -> f i ⇣ f j = 0) -> ∑ n f = msum nat_join 0 n f
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
msum_only_one : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (i : nat), i < n -> (forall j : nat, j < n -> i <> j -> f j = u) -> msum m u n f = f i
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
rel_iter.is_digit = fun c q i y : nat => y < q /\ (exists a b : nat, c = (a * q + y) * power i q + b /\ b < power i q) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments rel_iter.is_digit (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
nat_joins_binary_le_left : forall (n : nat) f (m : nat), msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ m < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ m)
nat_joins_binary_le_right : forall (m n : nat) f, (exists i : nat, i < n /\ m ≲ f i) -> m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f
binary_power_split : forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}
nat_ortho_joins_left : forall (m n : nat) f, m ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n f = 0 < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> m ⇣ f i = 0)
binary_le_power_inv : forall i a b : nat, a ≲ b * power i r -> {a' : nat | a = a' * power i r /\ a' ≲ b}
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
